title: Mihrab of Madrasat al-Amir Taybars at Al-Azhar Mosque
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description:  No.211 Mosquée El-Azhar (Kibléh). Madrasah Taybarsiya: mihrâb. Translation of photographer's description: No.211 Mosque of Al Azhar (Kibla). Collector's note: Madrasa of Taybarsiya: mihrab.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Mihrab of Madrasat al-Amir Taybars at Al-Azhar Mosque
